pageProps.title: The Benefits of a Three-Day Water Fast: Reset Your Body and Improve Your Health
pageProps.metaDesc: In conclusion, a three day water fast can provide numerous benefits such as improving immune function, repairing damaged cells, removing dysfunctional cells and pathogens, reducing neuroinflammation, increasing autophagy, decreasing autoimmune disease, resetting gut flora, and increasing DNA repair. However, it's important to consult with a physician before starting a fast, especially for individuals with certain medical conditions or who take medications. During a three day fast, the body will start to deplete glucose and glycogen stores, increase hormones like glucagon and human growth hormones, produce ketones from fats, and go through processes like gluconeogenesis, autophagy, and mitophagy. By day two, the body will start to break down aggregates and inefficient mitochondria, leading to further benefits like improved brain health and decreased insulin resistance.
